ygData.subject: Re: Cross Research
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I just recently saw an addition to the seller of spellbooks (we all know the merchants: Throwing dagger, scroll, quill, wrist pouch, and books, of course).
ygData.messageBody:
On Tuesday, May 25, 1999 2:31 AM, kalekona@... [SMTP:kalekona@...] wrote:
> From: <kalekona@...>
>
> I too believe that we should be able to research ANY
> spell....that would give us a reason to study ALL other
> languages....(For those of us that don't want fully written
> out instructions on what components are needed for what)

I just recently saw an addition to the seller of spellbooks (we all know the merchants: Throwing dagger,
scroll, quill, wrist pouch, and books, of course). There was a book called "On Languages" which explains
not exactly as to which books use which language, but moreso as to easier books use these languages,
later books use these languages, and most advanced books use this language.

Don't know when this was added however.
